## Source: ossf-package-analysis (db6640c2642fecbcd1114796262a8099bf2f0db6e5f020af28ce841c8f35e27a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'opensource.ripple.com' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
